        Choose the drug which blocks basal as well as stimulated gastric acid secretion without affecting cholinergic, histaminergic or gastrin receptors

CHAIN: "Pirenzepine" -> "anticholinergic" -> "blocks cholinergic receptors" -> "reduces gastric acid secretion" -> "affects cholinergic receptors" -> 50%
CHAIN: "Famotidine" -> "H2 receptor antagonist" -> "blocks histamine-induced gastric acid secretion" -> "affects histaminergic receptors" -> 60%
